answers.answer: I find it interesting that i cant find out any information on cerebral peduncles....not even in reading other people posts............no answers to them.  I have a lesion within the left cerebral peduncel and also small vessel damage also on the left side.  There was also a lesion in the left frontal lobe white matter.......and as with others here my neurologist didnt answer my questions.  He also did a ANA test which came back postive.  Since strokes, epilepsy, heart attacks, schleroderma, diabetes, arthritis and cancer run in my family..........just would like to know what to do next.Thanks

question: have had TAH in january 2007, just after found i was getting headaches daily and long lasting, along with this numbness all down left of body with pins and needles, been refered to neurologist, had first MRI and showed a mass lesion in the right cerebral peduncle....??? condiion still as bad having second MRI this week but results come back after due date of flying on holiday, my consultant is not too keen on saying what he is finding and will not advise on travel ...please needing contition explained and any info on flying....thanks
title: lesion right cerebral peduncle
